entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
